modName: The TBBP animation of Dragonfly with butt bounce
summary:
New animation walking , inspired on the famous animatons by Dragonfly
but adding effect \\\"jiggling\\\" on the butt.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img109/1807/adecviktbbptest.gif[/img]
 

[color=#9f9f9f][font='lucida grande', 'lucida sans unicode', arial, verdana, tahoma, sans-serif][size=3]Dragonfly's TBBP animation with butt bounce[/size][/font][/color] new animation walking , inspired on the famous animatons by [color=#FFA500]Dragonfly[/color]
but adding effect "jiggling" on the butt and footsteps.

 [size=6][color=#ff0000]Confirmed:[/color] that works with [color=#ee82ee]UNP[/color], [color=#00ffff]UNPB[/color] [color=#008000]CBBE[/color],[color=#ffd700]ADEC[/color][/size]
 
 
[color=#FFFF00][size=5]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color]:
[size=4]Works only with TBBP versions[/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30770]Adec Caribbean Body[/url] for see the effects,also UNP, UNPB CBBE,ADEC
 
[color=#FFFF00][size=5]INSTALLATION ORDER[/size][/color]:


1- Body mesh : MAKE sure that supports TBBP
2- get the textures from the body mod that you want that can be "CBBE , ADEC , UNP , " the choise is yours.
3- xp32 maximum skeleton
4- this mod

if you a user of Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS by fore Make sure to run "GenerateFNISforUsers"



[color=#FFFF00][size=5]MY OTHER MODs[/size][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31469]ADEC MORPHER TOOLS [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30770]Adec Caribbean Body[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25070]Victorias High Heel walk Animation BBBB[/url]
 
[color=#FFFF00][size=5]Known Problems[/size][/color]:
-If your character levitate 10 inch from the ground , try the skeletons that Skulltyrant have done for TBBP users.[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16712]Custom Skeleton Replacers by Skulltyrant[/url] or reinstall XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS.

-If you character have butt crushed after death then you need download the fix that xp32 made for TBBP.[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url]

-For users that have installed[color=#ffff00] [font=Trebuchet MS , Helvetica, sans-serif]Dual Sheath Redux [/font][/color][color=#7c7c7c][font=Trebuchet MS , Helvetica, sans-serif]by [/font][/color][color=#add8e6][font=Trebuchet MS , Helvetica, sans-serif][b]Neovalen[/b][/font][/color]

[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS , Helvetica, sans-serif]There is an app that comes with mod [/font][/color][color=#ffa500][font=Trebuchet MS , Helvetica, sans-serif]"Dual Sheath Redux"[/font][/color]

[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS , Helvetica, sans-serif]Just make sure you run the app [/font][/color][color=#ff0000]Java Runtime Environment 7 update 17 or greater[/color] [color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS , Helvetica, sans-serif]when you install this mod and , if you reinstall the skeleton,[/font][/color]

If you're a user of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811]Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS by fore[/url] Make sure to run "GenerateFNISforUsers" if you install this mod


[color=#FFFF00][size=5]LICENSE & LEGAL[/size][/color]
[color=#FF0000]WHATEVER THE CIRCUMSTANCES, NEVER EVER PUT THIS MOD ON STEAM!! and don't ask me to put it on steam either.[/color]
 
[color=#FFFF00][size=5]VIDEO[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xz4ul4_tbbp-butt-bounce_videogames#.UXFNwLV9BUZ][img]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/9399/example55.png[/img][/url]



 


[color=#FFFF00][size=5]CREDITS[/size][/color]:

[color=#FFFF87]-Acdale[/color] , [color=#FFFF67]dimon99[/color] , [color=#FFFF67]calyps[/color] , [color=#FFFF67]Caliente[/color] for the bodys mods "ADEC" "UNP" "UNPB" "CBBE"
[color=#FFFF67]-mark19850124 a.k.a Dragonfly0124 or ????[/color] [the author of TBBP animation] for the great job on TBBP dragonfly animations.
[color=#FFFF20]-Bethesda[/color] for creating Skyrim.
[color=#FFFF00]-Nexus[/color] for the great community.
(if i forgot someone else let me know)
